welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rosemead, where the charm of our diverse community and delicious cuisines await you. Take the time to explore our city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at LAX, serving most international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at LAX, serving Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving international and domestic flights for Aeromexico, Delta, and Virgin Atlantic.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for Delta and Delta Connection.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for American Airlines, American Eagle, and Qantas.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for American Airlines and American Eagle.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for Alaska Airlines, Air Canada, and Mokulele Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines, United Express, and Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines, United Express, and Star Alliance partners.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi for up to 45 minutes per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport offers a variety of amenities for passengers including dining options, rental car services, and private lounges.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Santa Monica Airport caters to private jet and charter flights, offering exclusive services and amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Chino Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
